comment:
LP:Linear Programming is a mathematical method used to determine the best outcome in a given mathematical model for a given set of constraints.
units:Refers to the quantity or amount of a specific component present in a pill, in this case, the amount of sleep-inducing medicine and anti-inflammatory medicine.
minimize:To reduce or make as small as possible, in this context, the objective is to minimize the cost for the patient while meeting the required dosage of medicine.
